vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrance.withdrawBalance (patch_4.sol#14-23):
	External calls:
	- balance > 0 && msg.sender.call.value(balance)() (patch_4.sol#17-22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userBalance (patch_4.sol#20)
